titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the statute of limitations on the award of the Congressional Medal of Honor.
To amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the statute of limitations on the award of the Congressional Medal of Honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: Eliminates the statute of limitations on the award of the Medal of Honor. (Under current law, the Medal must be awarded within three years after the date of the act justifying the award.)
